1.content: As much as I hate starting this way, we have to pick a main character to focus on during this (aka- the person you follow or are in the story. Not necessarily the one who will be pregnant.)
1.title: Chose a main character

11.content:
This is Link
http://teenymanolo.com/wordpress/wp-cont...

We find Link at the fountain of the great faerie. Receiving a potion that he was requested to get by random town's folk.
(going into Link's perspective now)

I walked out from the faerie's cave and looked at the potion. I had to figure a way to keep from mixing it up with one of my own potions... it had the same color to it as my own health potions. I decided to stick a piece of paper on it with a big "T" on it to keep it apart from the rest. With that out of the way, it was a long walk back to the townsfolk who wanted it.

On the travel back it started to get late, not many monsters seemed to be out so it seemed like the best time to set up a small camp. Gathering wood for a fire, and making a soft spot with leaves and such for a bed. The sun had set and the fire was roaring. No telling what time it may have been, but it was time to rest for the trek back to town tomorrow.
11.title: Link

choices: Get distracted by a chicken running past.
111.content:
While I slept in the night, unbeknown to me someone has swapped the labels on my potions.

Come the sun rise, I got up and stretched. Seeing nothing but red coals left for my fire, I kicked some dirt onto it to put it own the rest of the way. Continuing on my journey back it was all quiet and peaceful, except for a single octorock which happened to take me by surprise. Not much of a fight, but still nicked me pretty badly for a surprise attack. Not worrying about it, I continued on the way back to town. Upon arriving...
111.title: Someone switches the potions around.

choices: She tells me what the potion was.
I visit town a week later and she wants her rupees back.
1111.content: I got to town and quickly drank my health potion. Not wanting to show up all beaten and battered to the person when I deliver their potion. I go to their house and enter. Handing the potion over to the woman who requested I get it for her, being paid 100 rupees for my efforts. I watch as the lady quickly drinks the potion and then thanks me for the effort.
1111.title: Drink my health potion (wrong one)

choices: I start to feel strange as I leave town.
Go back to the faeries and ask what she had to do to get the potion.
11111.content: "Why thank you so much Link, this potion will change my life if it really works. Not that I doubt the powers of the great faerie, but you never know. If all goes well, I will be having a child despite being a lonely woman. They sure can work wonders with potions, those faeries." She continued to thank me a while before I left. It was nice to see she was happy to get her potion. Not really wondering how she got the faeries to make the potion though... usually it is a give and receive policy with them.
11111.title: She tells me what the potion was.

choices: Catch a fish and eat it.
Navi notices Link's belly is slightly bigger now.
111111.content: After I walk out from the town I started to feel slight stomach aches. Nothing too serious to stop me, but still a distraction. As I get out of sight of the town I feel the aches again. Thinking I might just be hungry I sit myself down on a rock at the edge of a nearby river. I take out my fishing pole and cast a line out. Trying to focus on getting food and not focus on the aches that keep happening.
111111.title: I start to feel strange as I leave town.

choices: Link shrugs it off and resumes his fishing
1111112.content:
It took less then the time for link to cast his line out from his little perch on the bank for his helpful if some what annoying guide slipped from her hiding/resting place in his shirt.

She buzzed around him as she normally did but link pushed that out of his mind the same way he was trying to do the aches, the bloated feeling, the general pain were just hell on the normally stoic’s hero’s mood.

“Hey link you doing okay?” The little sprite asked as she buzzed around him.

“Just fine” He replied back straight forwardly not truly in the mood for much of a conversation.

“That walk surely did not tire you that badly out!” She persisted.

“I just figured I could stop and catch some thing to eat.” He replied quietly, his mood slowly slipping from just general annoyance to subtle anger.

The sprite sighed and gave up for the moment and just buzzed around him once more before landing upon his well toned and trimmed stomach…Or what once had been his well toned and trimmed stomach.

The sprite blinked her tiny eyes in confusion and pushed down with her even smaller hand and blinked in surprised as she felt the skin give and move almost like link had gained weight.

Link mean while was busy still trying to catch a fish out there with little success due to him having no bait and the fast waters of the stream, he sighed to himself in the realization he probably would need to head back to town to get some thing to eat.

“LINK!” Navi all but screamed as she took off and landed next to his ear.

Link shock dropped his fishing rod and leapt up, his hand already on his sword assuming his little friend was warning him about approaching monsters.

“Did you gain weight?” The little sprite asked in a almost completely serious tone.

Link deadpanned and just sighed as he ran a finger across his stomach absently and felt the slight bulge.

His face heated with embarrassment as he realized the little fairy was correct, but he had not ate anything today since his disgusting ration bar this morning! In fact he was starving, he barely ate he almost seemed to fast most of the time. How could he gain weight?

“I don’t know how that happened…” He answered truthfully
1111112.title: Navi will never shut up!

choices: He noticed his belly was even bigger!
He cooked the fish and ate it
11111122.content:
He sighed and shook his head before sitting down and picking back up his simple fishing rod. He did not know how he had gained the lump upon his stomach but in truth it did not bug him all that much…At least not as much as his increasingly growing hunger. ‘Maybe it is just bloating from the hunger?’ He thought hopefully to himself as he flicked the line into the water and slowly began to reel it in.

“Are there no fish even at this pond?” He voiced after casting out his line for the ninth time sense the discovery of his “mystery weight” but suddenly he felt a tug on the line as he reeling it in and just blinked in shock. But he immediately went into the motions of trying to catch this fish…He really hoped it was a big one! He stood up and just violently pulled back on the rod, reeling it as fast and hard as he could. The fish for it’s part was also putting up quite the struggle.

But the hero of time was stronger then any normal fish and eventually he pulled roughly and the fish just shot out of the lake and flopped about lazily on the cold wet bank of the pond, link grinned as he gazed down at his prize. It was a bass, not a especially large one, but easily nine or so pounds and that would definitely help his situation with the hunger. He slid the fish into one of his ever convenient bottles put up his fishing gear and began the slow walk back to camp. Once he got back he…
11111122.title: Link likes to fish

choices: He noticed his stomach was moving!
He found his stomach was slightly bigger then it had been before
111111222.content:
After the long process of deboning, and scaling the fish he finally was done. He had cut the slim tidbits of meat he had gotten from the fish into filets and was now waiting for the water he had gotten from the pond to boil. The small iron pot creaked slightly at the heat and “Pregnant” Male winced at the sound. But it at least meant the water was near boiling temp, he had hoped this would be slightly quicker and easier as it seemed his hunger grew every couple of minutes and his hunger pangs were beginning to be quite painful. Finally the water began to boil and he just gently placed the two filets into the water, he hoped the fish would be cooked relatively soon as his stomach was just killing him now. He watched the pot closely, just licking his lips and absently rubbing at his enlarged stomach.

It was nothing truly large yet but it looked out of place on the relatively trim and in shape hero of time. He just sat there fidgeting occasionally and waiting for the fish to be cooked enough to be ready to consume. He may have used spits or maybe even fry it, that would certainly tasted better but boiling it was the fastest way to eat it and he decided upon that because he was just so hungry. Finally after a few more minutes passed the smell of cooking fish just swarmed through the blonde’s nostrils and he just sighed contently as he watched the pale meat, brown and then golden before he pulled the pot off the fire and dug out a few utensils and a plate. He then jabbed a large fork into the still steaming water and pulled out both pieces of fish with it, the fish was cooked decently and well done and he hoped it would be tasty but that really did not bother him all that much as he slowly begin to dig into the fish.

The next ten minutes were a graphic scene of him just eating every inch of the filets, he hacked into them and bit them and torn them apart in a show not fit for others being around him. But he was finally filling that empty feeling within him so he was content. He finally let out a content burp and just fell back, he had ate like a glutton but did it not bother him for the first time in about two days he felt full and happy. His stomach let out a groan of contentment as well and he just slowly put the pots and plates back into his back and just fell back on it, using it as a makeshift pillow. He figured he could just camp here before returning to town, or even the castle so he could continue on with his adventures.

He drifted off into a content sleep and just groaned happily as he dreamt….when he awoke
111111222.title: A fishy meal

choices: Something is moving inside his belly.
His belly suffers a growth spurt.
1111112222.content:
It wasn't really noticeable at first glance, but Link could definitely tell. It seemed like his middle had grown overnight, stretching out his clothes a little more than before. It also felt heavier, for some reason. Link placed a hand on it, and was surprised when it felt hard to the touch. Weren't fat bellies supposed to be a lot... squishier? He pushed in with one finger, but the skin hardly gave in. It almost like he was carrying something in there.

Link shook his head, he'd rather not think about it and just continue on his journey. He didn't feel sick, so there wasn't anything deathly wrong with him, right? He could just buy a health potion next time he's in a town and that would be the end of it. And so, he got up, woke up Navi and packed away the campsite. Once everything had been put away, they headed north, where Link knew they would find a tiny settlement.

They set out, but after an hour of walking, Link felt something strange. He stopped and placed a hand on the undercurve of his bulging middle. Was the strange sensation coming from inside?
1111112222.title: He found his stomach was slightly bigger then i...

choices: Whatever is in Link's belly starts kicking hard.
11111122221.content:
Link's brow lowered in confusion as he tried to figure out what he was feeling. It was almost like...there was something squirming around inside his stomach. Staring down at it, Link slowly rubbed the side of his belly. Whatever was causing the odd sensation seemed to act in response, making the squirming sensation a little more stronger. It felt like something was rubbing against the stomach walls from the inside.

Weird. Link had never felt anything like this. What could be wrong with him?

"Link?" Navi called out to him, having just noticed that Link had stopped. "Are you okay?"

"Yeah, I'm okay. Let's go!" The young hero pushed all his doubts to the back of his mind, and started walking again. Everything would be fine once they reached the nearest town and bought a health potion. The faster they got there, the faster he'd be back to his normal self again.

Navi followed him, not believing for one second that he was 'okay', especially when he still had a hand fixed to his stomach.
11111122221.title: Something is moving inside his belly.

11111122222.content:
Link's eyes widened in shocked surprise as he saw and felt his stomach bulge further. It was growing! But how? Why? He placed both of his hands on the growing mass and, with a pained whimper, tried to stop it. The sound of Link in pain caught Navi's attention, and she rushed to his aid.

"Link! What's going on? What's happpening?" She cried out.

"It's my stomach!" Link grunted. "Make it stop!"

Navi stared at him in surprise, then shifted her gaze to his middle. At first glance, she couldn't see anything strange about it. It was bigger than it was before, but... wait a second. There! She could see it! It was a slow process, but Navi could see how the fabric of Link's shirt stretched on and on. She dived down towards it, and pushed against it with all her strength.
11111122222.title: His belly suffers a growth spurt.

111112.content:
I travel all the way back to the faerie cave, nothing getting in my way on the trip. Tossing in ten rupees to the fountain, the great faerie appears in front of me. "Excuse me... but... can you tell me what that woman in town had to do to get the potion from you?" She stayed silent for a moment. "I know you usually ask for something first, or something in return... I was only wondering-" She raised her hand to stop my short.

"I shall tell you. As you know faeries don't just magically appear. With her request for a child, we too need more children. She agreed to help bare faerie children with her own. So if she wished to keep one upon birth, it would turn to a human child and not be a faerie. Meanwhile the others would return to me as my children." She took a pause, starting to fade away. "As not to overwhelm her, she would only carry a dozen of my children, much smaller than most human infants, but plenty enough." With that last fact she faded away.
111112.title: Go back to the faeries and ask what she had to ...

choices: I happen to run into someone.
1111121.content: With that knowledge and the fact that the faerie has left, I leave the faerie cave. Heading back for home, which was a much longer journey than to town. On the night of the first day back to home I stopped in an opening in the woods to set up camp. Roasting up some natural fruits and berries found nearby. Resting and relaxing till the next day. As I continued my journey home...
1111121.title: Leave to go home.

choices: Navi confesses she switched the potions.
Just continue on the way home, no questions asked.
11111211.content:
"Hey! Listen!" Navi started, "Link, we should take the roads and not the woods. Lets not take the chance of running into anything."

I look at Navi and stop in my tracks, having a strange feeling about this. "Navi, since when did I ever stop and take the easy way back? I always take the fastest." I start to continue walking the way I was instead of heading for the road.

"HEY!" She jumped in my way and made me stop short. "You have no health potions, if we run into anything you won't be able to heal yourself. Take the road. It is safer." She stayed floating in my way till I gave in and started heading for the road. This was very strange of Navi, she never questioned my choice before...
11111211.title: Navi "Hey! Listen!"

choices: Navi tried to cheer me up.
111112111.content:
I stare at her annoyed and pissed off. Giving her the "I'm not in the mood" stare. Slowly lifting my butterfly net up and a bottle in the other hand. "Give me one good reason I shouldn't..."

Before I could finish my threat she panicked and blurted out, "I switched the potions on you!" There was a long pause just then. "You... drank the lady's pregnancy potion... You... are pregnant with faeries..."
A few seconds later I just dropped everything in shock to what she just told me. Slowly looking down at my belly.
111112111.title: Navi confesses she switched the potions.

choices: Heck no! Still mad at her!
Understood Navi and try to comfort her
1111121112.content:
My partner tired to cheer me up. She explains that she always had feelings for me and wanted a way to have children with me. She knew she would be too small to have sex with me and afriad I would reject her since we are both different races.

After hearing this, did I feel a little better?
1111121112.title: Navi tried to cheer me up.

choices: Get Help from the Fairy of the spring
11111211122.content:
So Navi had some feelings for me. I guess it makes alot of since. We have been traveling together for a long time and she has been helpfu. Sadly I never thought of her being my girlfriend, but maybe I should of given her the chance and I might as well now.

Now I'm pregnant with faries, what do I do now?
11111211122.title: Understood Navi and try to comfort her

choices: Navi offers to do something special for me.
Rest for the day. (skip to next day)
111112111221.content: "Navi... lets get home... my mind and body have to get used to some of this... But thank you for telling me... I'll be much more cautious with our babies." Smiling at her, I proceed to start walking along the road to the house. Navi perking up by my words and quickly following behind me, seeming to glow a little brighter now. The walk was longer than normal, but we managed to get back without a single hassle in the way.
111112111221.title: Keep the Fairies

111112112.content:
I sigh and go on the detour, just to shut up Navi. Continuing on the path was indeed safer but also boring. No monsters to fight and less scenery. Groaning the whole where back to home, just to make a point to Navi that this is not enjoyable in the least. Upon getting to the house he stops at the door, "There Navi... safe and home... and never doing that again. Now it is dark out and we might as well go to sleep. Nothing else to do for the day."

"But... you... you have to keep taking the road...", Navi tried to argue for me to take it safe.
Cutting her off, "NAVI, I will go and get a health potion, but then I am taking whatever path I want to. Now, I am going to go sleep and don't try to talk me out of it tomorrow." Overnight.......
111112112.title: Just continue on the way home, no questions asked.

choices: Finally noticed his belly is bigger.
Navi points out his belly has grown.
1111121121.content: In the morning Link got out of bed. Stretching and yawning loudly. His belly has swollen a bit over night, enough for anyone to notice if they stared for a few seconds. Though still tired, Link happened to not notice yet, just feeling tired. He went over to the window and looked outside, seeing it raining terribly out. Just added to the mood and mindset. Everything in his mind right now was a 'blah' mood. He got out of his sleeping clothes and started to try dressing in his normal outfit when...
1111121121.title: Link's belly slightly bumps.

11111211211.content:
"er... this is... new...?" said as he squeezed himself into his normal outfit for the day. Letting out a sigh after he fought it on over his belly. Looking down and putting hand on his belly. "I'm... no, this isn't fat... great... I should probably go see someone about this... this isn't a good thing at all." He walked towards the door, staring out into the rain. Not looking forward to a journey in the rain, but who to see...

Zelda would be wise in case this has something to do with Ganon.
Maybe Saria would be a better choice though, closer and easier to get to.
11111211211.title: Finally noticed his belly is bigger.

choices: Zelda already knows what is wrong.
111112112111.content: I left in a hurry to get help. It was a long run to get to the castle to see Zelda. The rain not helping at all. All the while, I didn't notice my hand naturally resting on my belly as I ran all the way. The slight additional weight just added more concern for me. Upon reaching the castle I hurried to get all the way to Zelda's room. "Zelda! I need some help... this isn't normal..." Zelda came out of her room and helped me to her bed for me to lay down on.
111112112111.title: Go to visit Zelda.

choices: Saria knows already what is happening.
111112112112.content: I left in a hurry to get help. It was a short run to get to through the woods to meet Saria. The rain not helping at all though. All the while, I didn't notice my hand naturally resting on my belly as I ran all the way. The slight additional weight just added more concern for me. Upon reaching the clearing in the forest I hurried to Saria's house. "Saria! I need some help... this isn't normal..." Saria came out of her house and quickly helped me inside, resting me on her bed.
111112112112.title: Go to visit Saria.

choices: Get a straight answer from Saria
1111121121121.content:
Saria looked me over, gave me an occasional poke or prod, and mused to herself, probably running the possibilities through her head. Her answer to my concern didn't really help much, though. "Well, Link... As impossible as it may seem... I'm fairly certain you're pregnant."
"Pregnant?!?! But I- but you- but how..." I managed to sputter out before the real shock hit me. I was pregnant, and I was almost certain I knew why.
Once I calmed down enough to speak coherently again, I asked the first concern I had at the time. "Is there anything you can do to help?"
"Well, I can't really do much. Zelda would probably have a better idea of how to help you." She replied.
I didn't know what to do... Zelda was certainly more knowledgeable and probably knew something that could help, but Saria seemed like she knew something, but wasn't willing to say anything...
What to do?
1111121121121.title: Saria examines me.

11112.content:
I got a message that a woman I given a potion to wanted to see me. So I went to her place.

She was really mad at me because I given her the wrong potion that was suppose to make her pregnant to have a child. She wanted a refund.

Lucky for me, I have more then enough to refund her for the mistake. But besides that, what is my current state?
11112.title: I visit town a week later and she wants her rup...

choices: Drank potion to heal wounds (Wrong one)
1112.content:
I ignored all the pain and delivered the potion to the woman not knowing I delivered the wrong one. She paid me and drank down the potion. She told me it would help her bare children since she is so lonely.

After that I went on my way to wherever my next adventure will take me.
1112.title: Simply deliever the potion (wrong one)

11122.content: I ran into some girl, who is it?
11122.title: Ran into a girl

111222.content: So it was not the Zora Princess. Was it Zelda?
111222.title: Hyrule Princess?

1112222.content: So it was neither princess. Was it Malon?
1112222.title: The Farm Girl

11122222.content: OK, so it was not another of those girl. Maybe to my surprise I see Saria outside of the forest.
11122222.title: My Best Friend

112.content:
(Originally by: C.M, Bloodred )

Several hours later I was having trouble falling asleep. Between the traveleing, the fighting and the errands for people I had been running, I couldn't even really tell how much sleep I had even gotten over the last several days. I thought to myself,
"Perhaps if I drink a potion, it'll help me sleep."
I rumaged around in my sack for a sleeping draught and I pulled out something that I should have recognized as the potion I had marked, but much to my chagrin, the note that I had left on the bottle had fallen off, and I was too tired to notice! I downed the potion, and immediately I felt drowsiness take over my limbs and I felt my eyelids close on their own.
112.title: Trouble Sleeping

1121.content:
(Originally by: C.M, Bloodred )

I woke up the next morning with an unfamiliar feeling in the pit of my stomach. I turned over on my side, and that movement was enough to turn my stomach so that my nausea got even worse. Then I did something that I had never done before: I threw up! In all of my time fighting monsters, spider demons and dealing with general gore, nothing had made my stomach more agitated than that simple movement from my back to my side. Over the next several days, my nausea got worse and worse. One day it was so bad that I couldn't leave the wash-room for more than a few moments because I would be throwing my guts up every few minutes. Finally, I was feeling so weak that I picked myself up, and found my way to the local healer's office.
1121.title: Wakes up ill.

11211.content:
I could not believe my ears! The healer told me I'm pregnant. It must be a mistake!

But the healer told me it is no mistake.

So now I ask the Healer what he can do for me.
11211.title: Healer tells him he's pregant.

112111.content:
The Healer told me there is two ways to deal with this. One solution is to use a serum to make me female to deal with having a child better. I guess I can preserve the life by being a woman until I have the child. But it might be hard for me to be a woman, I might not be able to adventure much and if I became male again, it would confuse the child. Or there is a different serum that would allow me to stay male, it just would make me more female like. Wider hips to help carry the child, and a stretchier body to help with the birthing.

(This chapter was edited. I am not supporting the option of abortion)
112111.title: He has some solutions

choices: Link gets desperately hungry once again,
1121112.content: Link decides to take the second option as he detests the idea of ending the life anyone or anything that is not evil in the slightest. The healer begins to make the serum which when finished will make Link into a full female which will help with the pregnancy. The healer make the serum into a drinkable form which he inistructs Link to drink, and it will gradually make link female. Link slowly drinks the pink potion which looks like an ordinary healing potion, then waits for it to kick in fully, and the process begins slowly with his hair starting to grow into long silky lengths. "Link you will slowly change into a female version of yourself, you must stay safe as the potion may make you a bit weaker, and you should stay here until the transformation is finished." The healer slowly leads the gradually changing Link into a bedroom which is painted a neutral yellow, then he leaves to see if he has any other patients, and lets Link get settled in.
1121112.title: Become Female

choices: Zelda lets Link sleep for now
Link wakes up confused and asking questions
11211121.content: Link begins to feel extremely sleepy as more time passes by but is soon asleep. The healer with the assistant of Zelda carries now very female Link to bedroom where she is laid down for a nap. Zelda agrees to keep an eye on Link as she sleeps but if Link stays female Zelda most definitely must find a more appropriate name for her. Zelda stays awake for awhile though sleep eventually overcomes her and the healer tucks her into bed while heading back to her room. The night goes by quietly at least until the next morning when the sun wakes Zelda up but Link still slumbers despite all the changes as sleeps including a slight belly from the pregnancy.
11211121.title: Link starts to feel sleepy.

112112.content:
Sadly the Healer admitted he has no solution to my situation. He just wishes me luck with the new life inside of me.

I walked out of the building disappointed nothing could be done. But maybe I can see the fairy I got the potion from to see if she can fix it. But then again, for some reason I feel guilty on the idea of getting rid of the life in me. Maybe my body is making female hormones or it's messing my emotions or maybe it is real self feeling this way.
112112.title: He has no solutions

1121121.content:
Link decides to go back to the Great Fairy who gave him the potion. He explains the situation that he drank the potion.

The Fairy explains that the potion was for the woman he should have given to so she can have a child, but also in exchange give her fairies in return.

The hero is surprised that not only he has one life inside himself, he has several lifeforms, fairies.

So what does the Great Fairy do?
1121121.title: Go see the Fairy

11211212.content: How does she punish Link?
11211212.title: Punishes Link

choices: Link decides to visit all his female friends before complete his quest
Link lost the potion and someone else finds it
113.title: Something else?

choices: Call it for the night, the journey is long enough as it is.
Fuck it! Just a little touch!
1133.content:
It has been a while since the lands were being rebuilt. Zelda no longer had the connection to the sword, she was fine with it either way as it was no longer important.
She was waiting at camp while Link fetched the wood. Resting for what was to come after their quest in town.

Zelda: -Hope this will be the last of the potion hauling... I'm starting to have enough of doing people's errands...

She was right to be annoyed, it wasn't the first time they had to deliver some random potion or letter. Monsters weren't common but there had to be someone having problems somewhere, were they that unlucky?

They called it a day after spending some time in front of the fire. The horses doing their things as they went to bed.
The fire was just hot enough to light up the camp, giving a little shine on the curve of the princess, granting a little sneak peak for Link, imagining a couple of situations if he dared. Little that he knew much about her feelings, causing a some awkward moments at time as none would make a move.
1133.title: Twilight of the Wild

11331.content:
The next morning they packed up, in route for the town, galloping on the road to get there before noon.

They took a moment before seeing the town over the horizon as they crest the hill, on the way down to it. Just as they took off again a sudden arrow missed the hero by an inch, rearing the horse as he got knocked off.
He hit the ground hard, hearing a glass shatter with a load of blue smoke surrounding him.
Zelda stopped as she saw some bokoblins on the side shooting at them.

Zelda: -Link!

He didn't take long to defend, rushing from the smoke and taking care of the trappers swiftly.
Once done they both examined him, noticing the potion shattered, expelling it's content all over him. A great sigh came about when she realized he wasn't injured or afflicted. Although both annoyed that they couldn't complete the quest.
11331.title: Call it for the night...

choices: Zelda actually had some exposure to the fuming vapors
She is safe from the potion effect
113311.content:
They get ready to go back to town either way, annoyed to no longer have the quest item. But something causes link to fall on his side, not understanding exactly what is going on. He feels some things pushing and stretching, very uncomfortable.

Zelda looks at him still wondering what is going on before she notices dark fur starting to grow. Link letting a growl escape, making her jump as a big blue light envelops him, blinding both of them.

As the light fades away, the hero is no longer present, just a dark wolf with an elvish pattern on his fur. The princess recognizing the writing.

Zelda: -Link?... By the gods... What happened? Was it the potion?...

She tried to make him talk, unsuccessful as ever, a single bark escaping out of his maw. Surprising himself, forced on all fours, looking around a little panicked.
113311.title: Something strange happens to Link.

12.content:
Enough though Navi is a small but helpful Fairy to Link, she also is very much in love with him. The problem is that it seems too one-sided. Link shows no interests her, maybe that he thinks she is annoying, a different species and is way to small.

Maybe there is a way to be with Link and/or have his child...
12.title: Navi

125.content: Other ways to be with Link and have a child with him.
125.title: Something else

choices: She sprinkles it over his head
She slips it in his drink/potion
She accidentally gives it to someone else
1252.content:
Navi decided one day that she love Link and wanted to have his children. Unfortunatly it is impossible for faries to mate with hylians because of the obvious size difference. So she decides to turn Link into a fairy. To do this she went to a great fairy (doesn't matter which one) and asked her for some fairy dust to which she responded "I will grant you this desire. But if Link does not accept the transformation, you must take my place as great fairy so I may be free from this monotones life." "I accept your terms my lady" replied Navi

Now Navi needs to figure out how to make link take the dust.
1252.title: Makes Link into a Fairy

12522.content: Is link sharing the drink with someone?

125221.content: So who is Link sharing the drink with?
125221.title: Not quite as planned...

choices: Use her DNA, make Link have the child
Get Link's DNA for all the girls
What the Heck, force sex on Link
13.content:
The Hyrule Princess is tired to seeing Link not able to make a choice on what girl he wants. He seems like he is too nice to all of them and rather not make others anger. But Zelda has a solution.

The princess finds a potion book and finds a recipe on a potion to allow anyone to bear children. She finds everything that is required and mixes it up. But now she needs DNA of someone to make it work.

What does Zelda do.
13.title: Zelda

choices: I'll only help you if i get to have Link and some potion too
14.content:
(Originally by: JW24 )

This is Ruto: http://fc05.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2010/0...

Walking around the bedroom Princess Zelda provided for her during her stays at the castle Ruto was thinking of which of her suitors she should marry.

"So many choices but none of them would ever compare to him," Ruto thought as she looked out the window by the training yard to see Link teaching the newest recruits a few basic maneuvers."So strong and agile and smart and handsome," sighing as she thought back to when they first met,"even then I knew he was the one."

The reason Ruto was considering suitors was because her father had been pressuring her to choose from some of the fine zoras he had found in the kingdom so she could begin to produce heirs to the throne. Ruto only having feelings for Link had always gone to Zelda's whenever he began to be especially annoying. being a fellow princess she knew what it was like to have a father setting her up with people while having feelings for Link, though knowing how Zelda felt had always made her feel a tad jealous as link spent most of his time on the castle grounds training others or journeying Hyrule and playing diplomat instead of visiting her. It was then that Ruto realized she could solve both her heir problems and her Link problems at the same time.

"Zelda has the triforce of wisdom for a reason. I bet she could make a potion that will let me have Link's children and then he'll marry me." With her hopes of a future with Link driving her ,she found Zelda in her room and asked if such a thing were possible and if she were willing to do it.

"Well it is possible," Zelda stated as she flipped through one of her books on potion-making, "but...
14.title: Ruto

choices: Link for some reason loves Ruto
141.content:
"Why not?" asked Ruto in shock.

"Because it would be a dirty thing to do, Link should choose someone and maybe I might want Link someday" said Zelda.

"I see..." said Ruto sadly and walked away. Now there seems no hope for Ruto to have Link's children or maybe there is a way.
141.title: I won't help you

1413.content: What else could happen with Ruto involved?
1413.title: Something else

14132.content:
Ruto decided to break into Zelda's library to find a potion to solve her problems. It did not take too long to find the recipe for the potion that can make anyone bear children. She get the stuff needed for the potion and sneaks away and starts creating the potion. She finds out she needs someone's DNA to make it work.

Ruto decides to...
14132.title: She breaks into Zelda's library

choices: Ruto runs by plucking one of Link's hairs.
Ruto goes over to clean any of Link's wounds (get a blood sample).
143.content:
"Fine, I'll help you... if we get to share him. I want Link too." Zelda waited for Ruto's response.

"Agreed, so how do you make this potion? Won't we need something off of Link to get this to work", Ruto then asked, agreeing to share Link.

"You are right, we will need something off of Link... I'll stay here and get the rest of it ready, you go get a hair or something off of Link and bring it right back to me." Zelda then started with gathering up ingredients and mixing them up in a pot for them to later drink. Meanwhile Ruto ventured out into the courtyard where Link was training with the other soldiers. Trying to get up behind Link without being seen. Nervously scooting along the far wall behind Link. Ruto's chance was close, the training was taking a pause and...
143.title: On one (other) condition

choices: Link came in, looking for Ruto.
1432.content:
Ruto noticed Link did get a few cuts and scrapes. She happened to be there at the right time, she went over to Link as he sat down to try taking care of his own wounds. "Link! You shouldn't train so hard, look at you, you got cuts all over. Here let me clean them for you." Before Link could ever say anything she started to wipe all his lil scratches and cuts with a moist towel. Cleaning them all up and then patching them up. She smiled at Link to try to calm him. Holding the towel now covered with little bits of his blood, enough to discolor it fully. "Well... I better... go take care of this thing... and umm... bring you a potion." She got up and rushed back into the castle. Going to Zelda with the bloody towel. "I got it Zelda! Lets get this potion going!"

Zelda took the towel and got drips of Link's blood to go into the potion large enough for two. In moments the potion would be ready for the girls.
1432.title: Ruto goes over to clean any of Link's wound...

14321.content: In a few moments, the potion settled and changed to a more red color. The girls ever so eager to finally get Link as their very own. Zelda carefully poured the potion into two bottles. They both picked up a bottle of the potion and looked back out the window. Thinking of how the future will be now after they drink the potions.
14321.title: The potion is ready.

143211.content: Both princesses toasted to having Link's children and drank down their potions.
143211.title: They both drink the potion.

143212.content: One of the princesses stopped day dreaming before the other. As the other was still lost in thought, she grabbed both potions and ran out the door. Trying to get far away from the other before taking a breather. Opening one potion and drinking it all, feeling victorious over stealing the other's potion.
143212.title: One girl gets greedy.

choices: She drinks the other potion too.
Link comes by and thinks that the potion was the one Ruto was getting him.
1432121.content: Ruto snickered to herself, feeling the potion slosh inside of her belly. Already taking effect as her belly pushed out a little bit. Becoming a slight bump in just a few seconds. She was so over joyed and just stayed where she was, enjoying this and the idea of Link being only hers.
1432121.title: Ruto was the greedy one.

choices: Zelda Catches up to her (Uh, Oh)
14321211.content: The Zora Princess Drinks the other potion and it seems to double the rate of growth to her belly. Also for a possible side effect, her breasts grows more, maybe to produce more milk for more then one child. Ruto rubs her belly enjoying the thought of having two children then just onee and having bigger breasts for a while.
14321211.title: She drinks the other potion too.

choices: Zelda catches up and thinks Ruto drank it.
Link starts to feel the potion take effect.
14321212.content: Just as Ruto holds up the other potion Link came walking in. Grabbing the potion from her, "Oh thanks Ruto, this must be what you were going to get me. This should take care of everything, not that your bandage work do the trick... heh, well bottoms up!" And before Ruto could stop him, Link opens the bottle and started to chug the potion. All gone, he hands the empty bottle back to Ruto, who now has a blank and terrified face while looking at Link. Link smiled at first at her, then looked down at Ruto. "I... Ruto? Something wrong? Hello?" Link tried to get Ruto to snap out of it.
14321212.title: Link comes by and thinks that the potion was th...

choices: Zelda quickly tells Link the truth.
Link leaves and the girls panic.
143212121.content:
Just then Zelda came running in, "There you are Ruto! How dare you run off with my potion! You had your own, you greedy lil wench!" It was then she saw the empty bottle in Ruto's hands. "Great, you drank BOTH of the pregnancy potions! Now how am I suppose to- errr- umm..." She said too much too late. Finally noticing Link trying to shake Ruto out of shocked state.

"Pregnancy potion? Zelda... what do you mean by that... And what do you mean both?" Link let go of Ruto and looked at Zelda. Getting a bit of a agitated look on his face, wanting the truth. Especially since he drank the potion.

"Its... um... well... what it is isn't a 'pregnancy' potion... its a... well... to prevent pregnancy potion? Yeah, we just didn't want to worry about accidentally getting pregnant!" She nervously said, trying to not get Link suspicious of what they were up to.

"Oh... well... then it shouldn't have any effect on me. I was worried for a second there. Well I am going back to training, try to snap Ruto out of it." And Link started to walk away.
143212121.title: Zelda catches up and thinks Ruto drank it.

choices: Hear Ruto moan down the hall.
1432121211.content:
Ruto fell to the ground after Link left. Left in a daze and thinking this must be a dream- no a nightmare. Zelda just raised her hand up high in the air then let it fall and hit Ruto hard. Slapping her across the face. "Please tell me Zelda... that didn't not just happen..." Ruto asked, snapping out of her lost trance like state.

Getting up as she looked the other princess in the face. "I'm afraid it did... Link! Come back!" Zelda went to chase after Link quickly. Catching up to him right away. "Link! That potion... was... for us to get pregnant with you child... you... might be pregnant." Zelda was red in the face and tried to not have Link panic. Looking at his belly, not seeing any changed just yet.
1432121211.title: Zelda quickly tells Link the truth.

choices: Link is still Normal (Potion does not work on him)
14321212111.content:
Zelda returns to Ruto and sees that the Zora's belly is getting quite large. The Hyrule princess knows if this keeps going, she will have to help her deliver the child. But before she can do anything, she needs to check Link.

So Zelda drags Ruto and comes to see Link. What is his state?
14321212111.title: Checking Ruto

choices: can't stop staring at her pregnant belly.
143212121111.content:
"What's wrong with her?" Link asked.
"She drank the first potion. Link, it doesn't seem like you're affected by it so that's good news, it should just pass through your system like normal liquids."
"So she's about to deliver my baby?" Link questioned.
"No, no there's no contractions." Ruto said as she used the nearest wall to pick herself up. "I just wasn't expecting the growth spurt to be so soon, and so big."
"So you're fine?" Zelda asked.
"I'm fine. Just a little aroused from the sensations that's all, and look, my girls got bigger to." Ruto smile cupping her now EE36 cup breasts.
Zelda and Link blushed at Ruto's show of her engorged assets.
Ruto looks up and notices Link...
143212121111.title: Non effective potion.

choices: Link is now female and with child
143212121112.content: Sadly the potion has indeed affected Link, how?
143212121112.title: Not Normal

choices: Ruto kisses Zelda in a hormone flare-up.
1432121212.content:
Ruto fell to the ground after Link left. Left in a daze and thinking this must be a dream- no a nightmare. Zelda just raised her hand up high in the air then let it fall and hit Ruto hard. Slapping her across the face. "Please tell me Zelda... that didn't not just happen..." Ruto asked, snapping out of her lost trance like state.

Getting up as she looked the other princess in the face. "I'm afraid it did... maybe it won't work on a boy?" Zelda pondered for a moment. It was then she looked down at Ruto's midsection and noticed how fast it was working. "We will know soon enough..."
1432121212.title: Link leaves and the girls panic.

14321212122.content:
Ruto's belly starts to grow more and she can't stand it too much.

"Zelda, I think I will need help" said Ruto hopefully the Hyrule princess to help her.

Now Zelda needs to make a decision. Should she help Ruto, even though she stole both potion, or should she let Ruto suffer and check on Link?
14321212122.title: Ruto starts to grow more.

143212121222.content:
Zelda decided to leave Ruto behind. The Zora Princess cried out for Zelda, but the Hyrulian Princess ignored her.

The Princess finally catches up to Link. How is the hero?
143212121222.title: Check on Link

143212122.content:
The hero of Hyrule starts to feel VERY strange. Before his belly to grow, his body began changing. He started to slim down and becomes more feminine, but not losing his strength. His hair grew longer and his face became a woman's and the Adam's apple disappears. Breasts grew on his chest. Finally his manhood became womanhood.

Finally the heroine's belly started to grow with her own child.
143212122.title: Link starts to feel the potion take effect.

1432121221.content:
Zelda comes to find Ruto, very anger. But that quickly became confusion. "Ruto, who is this strange girl" said Zelda pointing to Link.

"It's me Link, Zelda!" said Link, "I drank the potion and now I'm a woman and pregnant"

"Oh Link" said Zelda with concern, "I'll help you to the medical room" Then Zelda comes by Link's side and helps her while her belly keeps growing.

"But what about me?" cried out Ruto as he belly grew bigger.

"Alright...guard!" cried out Zelda. A guard came and helped Ruto to the hospital room.

Ruto layed down, waiting to give birth to her and Link's child, she is curious what he or she will look like. But would not think her love now a woman would give birth as well.

This is such a strange situation for Link, at least she is a woman and does not have the complications as a man, who knows how a male could deliver a baby. She figures the child only has her DNA since it seems Ruto and Zelda wanted her child, it will be weird to sort of a clone of herself, male or female.
After a while, it became time for both to give birth to their children.

14321222121.content: To Ruto's surprise, Zelda kisses her on the lips. It seems to potion might have a bit of a side effect. Ruto is shocked to see Link coming to her.

"Link! What are you doing here?" asked Ruto surprised and curious.

14322.title: Link came in, looking for Ruto.

choices: Ruto lies what the potion is
143221.content:
"I want to let you know that I love you" said Link.

Before Ruto could say anything, Link presses his lips on Ruto. The kiss is full of true passion and she loves every moment of it and returns the kiss surprising Link.

"I guess you love me too" said Link.

"I had for a long time" said Ruto.

But before the couple could do anything else, Zelda comes in with the potion. "The potion is ready Ruto, huh?" said Zelda then surprised to see Link.

Link is confused what Zelda said, "Potion? What Potion?" asked Link.

Now Ruto and maybe Zelda as well are maybe in trouble...
143221.title: Confesses he loves her

1432211.content:
The Zora Princess did not feel like hiding it, even though it could ruin a relationship with Link.

"The potion is suppose to used to make anyone have children with someone's DNA like your own blood" said Ruto, "And I agreed to share it with Zelda so we can both have your children"

The hero is surprised to hear this, but how does he take it?

choices: Both of the girls say that if the Gerudo get to have his children then should to
Link leaves and both girls go ether to Malon or Nabooru for some answers

And 3, I already have gotten too many people pregnant!" yelled the enraged hero "wait, what!?" said the two princesses at the same time. "why do you think I go to the Gerudo valley so much? The Gerudo are all female and I am literally, the only male that's allowed to walk around the fortress.

choices: Link and Ruto go see King Zora
Ruto wants a potion for Link
14322112.content:
"Oh, I see" said Link, "My guess you were worried that you could not be with me"

"You are right Link and I'm not sure my father accept you in my family" said Ruto.

"Don't worry Ruto, I'll try to help you on that and besides I rather have our children together the natural way" said Link encouraging Ruto.

"That fine and well" Zelda spoke up, "But what about me? I want to bear a child from you"

"I'm actually OK if you do it Zelda, it's your choice" said Link.

"Why thank you Link" said Zelda happily.

"In fact why not take more samples of my blood so other girls can bear my children" said Link.

Zelda is surprised of Link's offer, but wasted no time to drain some more blood from Link to make a few more potions.

This is a very strange turn of events, but it kind of works out for any girl who every wanted to bear children from Link.

Ruto is actually serious about this. "So Link, do you want to try to have our child?" asked Ruto.

After hearing this, Zelda got an idea. "I might have a way to ease the pregnancy" said Zelda.

"Ok, let's hear it" said Link.

"I am thinking of making a potion that changes your gender, that way you have the right body and parts to have the child" offered Zelda, "But it is your choice"

Maybe Link can convince Ruto to take the gender potion so she becomes male so with them being together will not look so weird with anyone.

Or Link can try a lesbian sort of relation with Ruto.

153.content: How about some different Ocarina of Time Character?
153.title: Different Ocarina of Time Character

choices: A sleep potion after all! (Or so it seems at first...)
A fertility drug! (Malon is ovulating, and sexually irresistible)
1531.content:
"I can't thank you enough for letting me stay here, Malon..." said Link. for the umpteenth time that day as lugged his heavy sack up the stairs to the bedroom at Lon Lon Ranch.
"No need to thank me, Fairy Boy..." said Malon, letting the words drip from her open mouth as she drooled over Link's butt, following him up.

"So, I can just stick it where I please?" he asked.
"No!" Malon cried, realizing after answering that he was asking about a place to set his bag of belongings, not what had been on her mind since the second she saw him. "I mean, no... It'd be best for you to put it in the closet," she clarified, holding the door open for him.

As he was shutting the other door, she stol a quick peck off his cheek. He said nothing about it, so she started talking. "Y'know, I've been having a bit of trouble sleeping these past few nights..."

"Really?" he asked, seeming quite interested.
"Yeah, with Papa who-knows-where and Mr. Ingo frequently running off to town and coming back days later, reeking of cheap booze and cheaper women..." she slowly inched her face towards his as she spoke, "I've just been too anxious to get any rest..." she closes her eyes, her lips practically on his, to find...

He had gotten his sack back out and was rummaging through it.

He pulled out a bottle of blue potion with the consistency of a smoothie, and handed it to her. "This should help!" he told her.
"What is it?"
"A sleep potion! Or at least, I'm pretty sure that's a sleep potion..."
"Pretty sure?" she echoed.
"The old lady charged exta for labels... Anyway, she assured me nothing she sold me was harmful, so just take a swig, and if you're not tired there's three other potions here!"

Assured by his words, she did as he said and took a big gulp. Whatever it was, it tasted great, kinda like the juices of blueberries, only a little salty, and before she knew it, the bottle was half-empty.

"So? Ready for bed yet?" he questioned.
As her vision started to blur, Malon realized that the potion was...
1531.title: Malon

choices: Uses a potion, spell, wish, etc.

15512.title: Veran

1553.content:
Neither? Then how about the latest tale to the Legends of Zelda, Breath of the Wild?

If yes, will the soon-to-be-preggy-character be male or female?
1553.title: Other

info.brief_description: In the land of Hyrule, someone is about to have an adventure with pregnancy.
info.description:
In the land of Hyrule, during a time of peace, someone is about to get pregnant. Who will it be? Is it more than just one person? Who knows how it will happen or to whom.

This is a pregnancy focused story involving Legend of Zelda. Feel free to make the story go sexual, or silly to cause pregnancy.

Rules:
-No killing main characters
-Spelling and grammar please

Otherwise, have fun. Rules may be added if needs seem to arise for them.
